title: Ifsaa jireenya koo Yesuus ko mootii ko

lines: Ifsaa jireenya koo Yesuus ko mootii ko
Ifa dhalachuu keen nan arge fayyuu koo
Ifsaa kee naaf ifsii qajeelchi karaa koo
Utuu ati hin dhufnee gara biyya lafaa,
Ani furii hin argadhu silaa badeen hafa.
Ifsaa jireenya koo Yesuus ko mootii ko
Ifa dhalachuu keen nan arge fayyuu koo
Ifsaa kee naaf ifsii qajeelchi karaa koo
Ifsaa jireenya koo Yesuus ko mootii ko
Ifa dhalachuu keen nan arge fayyuu koo
Ifsaa kee naaf ifsii qajeelchi karaa koo
Gooftaa foon uffatttee akka naaf dhuftetti
Ifa dhalachuu keen na jajjabeessi ati,
Gara koo naaf kottu maaloo yaa Mootii ko
Na wajjin jiraadhu bara jireenya koo.
Ifsaa jireenya koo Yesuus ko mootii ko
Ifa dhalachuu keen nan arge fayyuu koo
Ifsaa kee naaf ifsii qajeelchi karaa koo
